snippet: Avanti is a professional. My brother and I inherited burial plots from our parents. We met with Avanti and discussed our situation. He was very knowledge and professional in helping us. It was the easiest and quickest property transaction I have ever encountered. We told him what we wanted for the lots. He found a buyer and set up a meeting between the buyers, my brother and I. snippet: I don't know where to start with this review. This young man has been a blessing to me and my family in so many ways.  Avanti first entered into my family life when he helped assist with the burial of my son's ( DaVonta) first child Malachi. Then life has a wired way of repeating itself Avanti also helped me with the burial of my son ( DaVonta)  2 months later.. I was so dizzy.. I didn't know what to do or how the process worked. Avanti worked a miracle out for Us. When I signed the paperwork on that Tuesday I thought everything was covered.. But it wasn't..  I got a call on the Thursday's day before the wake and I had to come up with $5882 for the burial in less than 24 hours before the wake which was that Friday This young man saved the day. He located a family who was willing to sell their plots for half the cost of what we were going to pay at the funeral home. When I tell you God had a ram in the bush this was it.  I will tell you... You will be in GREAT hands with this young man. You will have a peace of mind.  No regrets but peace!
